LanguageData.Keno_NoAutonomy.label: unnecessary
LanguageData.Keno_NoAutonomy.description: To focus in one's perception of what's better is unnecessary, but acceptable in the lack of authority. To force someone to manage themselves is wrong.
LanguageData.Keno_StandardAutonomy.label: neutral
LanguageData.Keno_StandardAutonomy.description: The work must be done whether it is tasked by someone else or myself.
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyWanted.label: wanted
LanguageData.Keno_AutonomyWanted.description: Free people should be able to decide how to manage themselves. To force someone to follow orders is wrong.
